resources.string:
Android prevents changing camera/microphone privacy while locked.

To enable automatic disabling on lock:

1. Go to Settings → Security → Screen Lock
2. Tap the gear icon ⚙️ next to your lock method
3. Set "Automatically lock" to 5 seconds or more
4. Disable "Power button instantly locks" (if present)

Note: If your device is configured correctly but this warning still appears, you can test if camera/mic actually disable on lock. If they work, you can safely ignore this warning.
